GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.15.34
GSD.description:
irqchip/gic-v3: Fix GICR_CTLR.RWP polling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 7218a789abb3e033f5f3a85636ca50d9ae7b0fc9, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit 021f653791ad17e03f98aaa7fb933816ae16f161. For more details please see the references link.
